titles.title: Recognizing the historic abolitionist events surrounding the Pearl, and honoring its legacy in American history.
Recognizing the historic abolitionist events surrounding the Pearl, and honoring its legacy in American history.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: Honors the legacy of those who furthered freedom in the Pearl Incident and recognizes their historical importance.
